snippet: The Clinton Administration announced its opposition today to a California ballot initiative that would end bilingual education in that state, saying the President and other officials would actively campaign against it.    Administration officials ...
lead_paragraph: The Clinton Administration announced its opposition today to a California ballot initiative that would end bilingual education in that state, saying the President and other officials would actively campaign against it. Administration officials said there was a ''very high likelihood'' that the Justice Department would sue the state if the initiative was approved, because it would violate the civil rights of students whose English is limited.
abstract: Clinton Administration announces its opposition to California ballot initiative that would end bilingual education in that state, saying President and other officials will actively campaign against it (M)

headline.main: White House to Fight California Initiative to Ban Bilingual Classes
